data.title: Ch11 KJC ADI Liquidation I AffidavitDeclaration of Maili PDF
data.meta_description: Ch11 KJC ADI Liquidation I AffidavitDeclaration of Maili.pdf - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document is an affidavit of service filed in the United States Bankruptcy Court for the District of Delaware. It states that on November 21, 2016, Epiq Bankruptcy Solutions, LLC caused to be served via first class mail notices regarding the effective date of the Modified Second Amended Chapter 11 Plan of Liquidation for ADI Liquidation, Inc. and related debtors. The notices included the Notice of Effective Date, a cover letter regarding the Notice, and IRS Form W-9. The affidavit lists the parties that received these documents, as shown on an attached exhibit.
